citation: Proclamation under the Living Marine Resources Management Amendment Act 2015 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Living Marine Resources Management Amendment Act 2015

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Living Marine Resources Management Amendment Act 2015 fix 1 July 2016 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

13 June 2016

C. WARNER

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

JEREMY ROCKLIFF

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 22 June 2016
